name: Baldi's Basics on the Gameboy Color [FANGAME]
name_original: Baldi's Basics on the Gameboy Color [FANGAME]
description:
Controls:
Arrows -- movement

Z -- A button (answer math problem/advance dialogue)

X -- B button (use the BSODA)

Shift -- Select button (start game)

Oh noes! Your friend left all his notebooks at Baldi's schoolhouse! You must go get them now!
